title: Start Your AI Business for Passive Income
description: Blueprint for launching your AI-powered online business in 7 days. This digital course takes you through proven frameworks to automate income streams, create AI-based products, and build your business, all from anywhere in the world.
features: Access to automation and AI tools tutorials
Guides for creating and monetizing digital assets
Join an exclusive community of ambitious learners building AI businesses together

title: 30 Day AI Content Challenge
description: Start making money creating AI-powered video content in just 30 days. This digital challenge walks you step-by-step through tools, techniques, and strategies to build a content brand, grow your audience, and monetize your creativity using AI automation.
features: 30-day guided challenge to master AI video content creation
Daily lessons, assignments, and prompts for hands-on learning
Learn to use top AI tools for video scripting, voice, and editing
Discover content monetization models and growth tactics
Join a community of creators building profitable AI content brands

title: Digital Nomad Starter Pack
description: Everything you need to start your digital nomad journey, including legal frameworks, tax optimization, and location scouting.

title: Remote Income Mastery
description: Advanced strategies for creating multiple income streams while traveling. Perfect for experienced remote workers looking to scale.

title: Location Independence Blueprint
description: Step-by-step guide to achieving complete location independence through strategic planning and execution.
